name: paradise-json-sync
description: Consolidación de archivos JSON y PDF de facturación

scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:e2e
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:unit:frontend && npm run test:unit:backend
scripts.test:integration: npm run test:integration:frontend && npm run test:integration:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:e2e
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt
scripts.install:e2e: cd e2e && npm install && npx playwright install
